repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:latest 
LABEL org.freenas.autostart="false" \  
org.freenas.interactive="false" \  
org.freenas.version="Latest" \  
org.freenas.upgradeable="true" \  
org.freenas.volumes="[ \  
{ \  
\"name\": \"/config\", \  
\"descr\": \"Config storage space\" \  
} \  
]" 
RUN apt-get update && apt-get dist-upgrade -y && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y python-pip && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir shreddit

VOLUME /config 
WORKDIR /config 

CMD ["shreddit"]
